SELECT answerRes.*, IFNULL(likeCnt.likeCount, 0) likeCount, IFNULL(collectCnt.collectCount, 0) collectCount FROM (( SELECT a.id answerId, a.question_id questionId, a.user_id userId, a.answer answer, u.`name` name, u.mobile mobile, u.zone_id zoneId FROM js_answer a LEFT JOIN js_user u ON u.id = a.user_id WHERE a.user_id = #{userId} ) answerRes LEFT JOIN ( SELECT answerId likeId, count( 1 ) likeCount FROM js_like GROUP BY answerId ) likeCnt ON answerRes.answerId = likeCnt.likeId LEFT JOIN ( SELECT answerId , count( 1 ) collectCount FROM js_collect GROUP BY answerId ) collectCnt ON answerRes.answerId = collectCnt.answerId)
